title: Introducing: Gawls
content:
Gawls, aka Louie Peacock describes his own music in a rather humorous yet insightful manner – ‘Unlike the rest of the boys my age, Gawls is what I do when I am alone in my bedroom’.

His self-titled debut EP is a delightful collection of five electro-pop tracks, that grows in strength, and confidence as it goes on. There’s hints of Yeasayer and Vampire Weekend in the songwriting, be it the sombre drawl of You’re Traditional or the more upbeat groove of Young. Check out the full EP below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
